version_description: This update fixes several bugs affecting the addition and storage of books.

Now we have a widget :)
And, of course, we never stop improving synchronization and fixing bugs.

In this version we made a new sorting by author in the library

And we also added some changes to the page "About book" (will you find them?) and fixed few bugs :)

Now eBoox supports PDF!

Add, read, sync your PDF docs and please be lenient to the developers if something working not perfect)

Like the dark theme? Now it is in eBoox! The theme can be selected in the library: day, night or auto (varies depending on the device theme).
Fixed a bug with screen backlighting and improved application performance.
Return button back to page. Minor bugs fixes and performance improved.
Fixed crashes with opening the book. Now the books are opening. Nothing will prevent you from reading books, adding fonts, using settings with a new design.
Fixed bug with color progress, which caused the application to crash.

For this update, we have added a welcome screen, which explains the features of the application. Read carefully so you don't miss anything.
Added shelf progress bar. Now you can see which books you haven't read and where they are hiding.
It seems that synchronization has not been performed for a long time. Synchronization has been fixed. We recommend running it again.
Accelerated application launch and fixed bugs

Meet! Cool new widgets for iOS 14, add them to your desktop and don't forget to read your favorite books. We did not forget about the early widgets, they even improved them a little). And as usual, we identified and fixed bugs, made the application smooth
